meanings.definition: Amines: organic compounds derived from ammonia in which one or more hydrogen atoms are replaced by alkyl or aryl groups.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied different types of amins in the laboratory.
meanings.sent2: Amins are commonly used in the production of various chemicals.
meanings.sent3: The amins in the solution seemed to dance under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The amins in the mixture acted like tiny magnets, attracting other molecules.
meanings.sent5: The smell of amins in the air was unmistakable and pungent.

meanings.definition: Amino acids: organic compounds that are the building blocks of proteins, containing an amino group and a carboxyl group.
meanings.sent1: Our bodies need a balanced intake of amins to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: A bowl of soup contains various amins that are essential for our diet.
meanings.sent3: The chef added a sprinkle of amins to the dish for extra flavor.
meanings.sent4: Amins are like the alphabet letters that make up the words of proteins.
meanings.sent5: The importance of amins in our diet cannot be overstated.
